bio: We are a metaverse, gamefi, socialfi project developed on Optimist
contributionDescription:
We are in the process of development, and currently, we have implemented support for connecting and logging in to our metaverse system using the OP network.

Here's a brief introduction to our business model:

Premium: The packages in the metaverse include various types such as Verification, VIP 1, VIP 2, etc. Users need to pay to upgrade to premium. 
Skins:
There will be special and limited skins and users will have to pay to own them.
Celebrity space: Celebrities can create private spaces to meet with fans, and users must have a "KEY" to enter the space. 
Online office: Users need to pay to use the online office.

We will use the OP network to carry out all transactions in our business model.

contributionLinks.description: Connect Ducky City with OP network

fundingSources.description: We will try to develop to contribute to building a strong Optimist ecosystem
